name: Cap'n Rescue
description:
STORY:

You are Captain Robert Goode, well respected and recognised around the globe for your many achievements.

Seperated from your crew, and captured by an evil witch from the future named Tyna, your soul has been placed in the body of your pet monkey.

No longer perceived as a threat in your simian form you have been left to wander in Tyna's fortress, but memories of your human life drive you to find your human body, and the potion that will return you to it.

Features:

Level select - return to any level you have already completed.

Checkpoints + save anywhere anytime through 'esc' menu.

Difficulty - Easy, Medium, Hard.

X-box style controller and keyboard supported (Arrows and Ctrl).

Collect all bonus items in a level to receive extra power ups.
